data.name: 8-Bit Armies: Arena
data.detailed_description:
8-Bit Armies: Arena is the multiplayer-only version of Petroglyph's popular 8-Bit Series of games! Get online and play one of six different armies across dozens of multiplayer maps versus players around the world.

Arena gives you the full PvP multiplayer functionality of 8-Bit Armies, Hordes, and Invaders including all of the following...

  • All 6 Armies (Renegades, Guardians, Lightbringers, Deathsworn, Colonial Marines, and Cranioids)
  • Over 30 Official Multiplayer Maps with support for 2 - 8 players and additional free maps created by the community
  • The original game tutorial to get you up and running quickly
  • Select music tracks from our composer Frank Klepacki across all three original titles
  • Replay mode to watch and learn new strategies from the top players
  • Observer mode to spectate games in progress and stream online
  • Custom Game options to choose your own win conditions, random crates, cash, and other parameters
  • Quickmatch mode - just click and get into the action
  • Dedicated 24/7 monitored servers

English*, French, German, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish, Arabic, Dutch, Romanian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz+ Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 6800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
